## Simple Function


### Simple function for z_score

```{r}
z_score_1 = function(x){
  
  z = (x-mean(x)) / sd(x)
  
  return(z)
  
}

z_score_1(x_vec)
```


### Simple function with Check

```{r}
z_score_2 = function(x) {
  
  if (!is.numeric(x)) {
    stop("input must be numeric")
  }
  
  if (length(x)<5) {
    stop("input must exceed 5 objects")
  }
  
  z = (x-mean(x)) / sd(x)
  
  return(z)
  
}

z_score_2(x_vec)
```


### with other input

```{r, error=TRUE}
z_score_2(3)

z_score_2("i love potato")

z_score_2(mtcars)

z_score_2(c(TRUE, FALSE, TRUE, FALSE))
```

Not working or working in the wrong direction with simple function.



## Multiple function

```{r}
mean_sd = function(x) {
  
  if (!is.numeric(x)) {
    stop("input must be numeric")
  }
  
  if (length(x)<5) {
    stop("input must exceed 5 objects")
  }
  
  mean_x = mean(x)
  
  sd_x = sd(x)
  
  tibble(
    mean = mean_x,
    sd = sd_x
  )
  
}

xx_vec = rnorm(1000)

mean_sd(xx_vec)
```



## Multiple input

simple input
```{r}
sim_data = 
  tibble(
    x = rnorm(n=100, mean=10, sd=5)
  )

sim_data %>% 
  summarize(
    mean = mean(x),
    sd = sd(x)
  )
```

```{r}
sim_mean_sd = function(n, mu=3, sigma=6) {
  
  sim_data = 
   tibble(
     x = rnorm(n=n, mean=mu, sd=sigma)
    )

  sim_data %>% 
    summarize(
      mean = mean(x),
     sd = sd(x)
   )
  
}

sim_mean_sd(1000, 50, 10)

sim_mean_sd(n=150)
```
